## TextElement.bounds property

Screen space bounds for this `TextElement`<!-- -->. Used by point labels in \[\[TextElementsRenderer\]\]. Valid after `loadingState` is `Initialized`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bounds?: THREE.Box2;
```
